title: 3 easy tips to help stay healthy during back to school from Pretty Prudent
description:
As her youngest starts kindergarten, blogger Pretty Prudent shares with us her top tips for helping stay healthy during back to school. 
Every year kids miss 22 million school days due to illness†, but Lysol® Disinfectant Spray and Lysol® Disinfecting Wipes kills 99.9% of germs, including 8 common cold & flu viruses* to help protect your home and family, so that back to school doesn't have to mean back to germs. 
*When used as directed
†CDC ‘Vital Health and Statistics. Current Estimates from the National Health Interview Survey, 1996.’; Published October 1999.
